trans-unit.source: Rapid Regeneration — The Swarmlord enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
trans-unit.target: 疾速再生～虫群领主进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为你本盘游戏中从统帅区施放你指挥官之次数的两倍。

trans-unit.source: Xenos Cunning — Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 异形狡智～每当一个由你操控且其上有指示物的生物死去时，抓一张牌。
